analysis.description: EPAYToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#315-321) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol:
	Contract EPAYToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

EPAYToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#291-295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#294)

EPAYToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#315-321)
	- /unique_chucks/7/0x3018acf3c08abb6f2a6774c32a041cf12a5c2da6.sol#320-321
